The electronic ______, all it is is the shorthand notation for that one electron approximation for the Schrodinger equation for lithium.
result.chn: 电子构型就是，对于锂的薛定谔方程,的单电子近似的,简化形式。(化学原理课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)

result.problem: It is one of the more ______ available vitamins for most people around the world.
result.chn: 这是一个更容易获得维生素对于大多数人来说，在世界各地。()

result.problem: All right. So you can already begin to see a development in intellectual history that perhaps opens the way to a certain ______.
result.chn: 好，所以大家已经开始看到,人类思想史的一个发展,它很可能为某种怀疑主义开辟了道路。(文学理论导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: These measures can ______ the quality of our life.
result.chn: 这些措施可以提高我们的生活质量。()

result.problem: She may not use God's name in a false oath, to ______ to or swear by a false oath. She is to honor God's Sabbath day, and honor parental authority, which is arguably an extension of God's authority.
result.chn: 她不可以以上帝的名义宣假誓,她应该敬重上帝的安息日，敬重父母亲的,权威，尽管人们对它是否是上帝权威的延伸是有争议的。(旧约导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Amy Smith says vampires also ______ to the many local differences across the United States.
(Speaking) Waxler says the agency should have provided better oversight and employed tougher standards for dealing with ______ effects of LASIK.
Seeking after happiness has been a most ______ experience , but one that I would not trade for anything .
result.chn: 追求幸福对我来说是十分艰苦的经历，但却是一种用什么我都不换的经历。()

result.problem: "What we are seeing in Iceland is that as the magma particles get towards the surface, they interact with the very cold water and they chill to form glassy ______ and these glassy ______ are small, they have sharp edges and when those get up in the air that is what is causing the risk to aviation."
Batstone-Carr says he thinks BP is strong enough to ______ this double-blow to its bank balance and its reputation.
I am making light of it and I think it's somewhat justified, because the evidence is just so ______.
result.chn: 我很鄙视这个观点,我认为我是有道理的,因为证据实在太有限(古希腊历史简介课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: He began ______ draw a car______on about sea creatures as a way ______ teach students about underwater life.
To the terror of the ______ lake.
result.chn: 因为这孤独的湖的惊吓。()

result.problem: Intermediate Sprocket: An ______ rotated sprocket, which positions the film in the aperture of a projector and moves it after the exposure cycle.
result.chn: 中间输片齿轮： 一种间歇旋转的扣片齿轮，它将胶片定位在放映机的片门中，并且在曝光周期后移动胶片。()

result.problem: The following three national campaigns ______ to do just that.
result.chn: 下面三个国家宣传片正是如此。()
